quote: All that incoherence. Selection, election, option, alternative. All behind him now. Codes and formats. Courses of action. Values, bias, predilection. Choice is a subtle form of disease.
quote_letters: ALL THAT INCOHERENCE SELECTION ELECTION OPTION ALTERNATIVE ALL BEHIND HIM NOW CODES AND FORMATS COURSES OF ACTION VALUES BIAS PREDILECTION CHOICE IS A SUBTLE FORM OF DISEASE
